TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContractSerializerMessageContractImporter extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension

summary.span: 處理從 WSDL 文件匯入資料合約訊息的作業。

span.span: Handles the importation of data contract messages from WSDL documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換 WSDL 描述時， 會由 叫用。The is invoked by the when converting a WSDL description. 它會檢查 WSDL 文件並產生記憶體中描述，以便稍後用於產生程式碼。It examines the WSDL documents and generates an in-memory description to be used later for code generation.
